title: How do people who leak music and music videos get ahold of the music before the public does? - Quora

response.answer_text: Either they have preview CDs or digital released or work for a radio station or tv station, maybe they work in the studio that produces the content. U2 once lost a CD at a press conference that someone stole, but it was not leaked I think. There were some leaks where someone recorded the audio at the studio using a microphone from the outside window.
